tool_description: Schedules availability windows and time-based restrictions for reward items including launch dates, expiration dates, seasonal availability, and promotional periods.

item_id.description: Unique identifier of the reward item to schedule availability for

launch_date.description: When the reward becomes available (ISO 8601 format)

expiration_date.description: When the reward expires and becomes unavailable (ISO 8601 format)

seasonal_availability.description: Whether this reward has seasonal availability restrictions

recurring_schedule.description: Recurring availability pattern: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, annually

timezone.description: Timezone for schedule calculations (e.g., UTC, EST, PST)

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Reward item must exist before scheduling availability.
Invalid date format: launch_date and expiration_date must be valid ISO 8601 date-time strings.
Invalid date range: launch_date must be before expiration_date when both are specified.
Invalid recurring_schedule: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, annually] if specified.
Invalid timezone: Must be a valid timezone identifier (e.g., UTC, EST, PST).
Past launch_date: launch_date cannot be in the past.
Conflicting schedule: Recurring schedule conflicts with specified expiration_date.
usage: Provide item_id as required parameter. Set launch_date for future availability, expiration_date for limited-time offers, and configure seasonal_availability with recurring_schedule for repeating patterns. Specify timezone for accurate schedule calculations in different regions.

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the availability schedule

current_availability.description: Whether the item is currently available based on the schedule

next_availability_change.description: Date and time of the next availability status change

schedule_summary.description: Human-readable summary of the availability schedule
